content: It’s nice to meet you Allison… I was also an introvert before it was cool and I have also had an easy time making friends even as an introvert. I am an ISFJ. Currently, I am bringing acceptance and understanding of introversion to my small community just by being myself and renouncing all the naysayers(okay, so I have lots of help keeping it that way). I enjoyed how incredibly honest your piece was. Thank you.
